name: Sandy Tseng
bio: Sandy Tseng is the author of the full-length poetry collection Sediment (2009). Her poems have appeared in the anthologies New America: Contemporary Literature for a Changing Society (2012) and Yellow as Turmeric, Fragrant as Cloves (2008). She is the recipient of a Discovery/The Nation Award and scholarships from the Bread Loaf Writers' Conference and the Vira I. Heinz Foundation, among others. Tseng currently teaches at the University of Colorado Boulder in Boulder, Colorado.
